product_name: Samsung Galaxy Buds2 Pro Wireless Earbuds
product_description: Discover the exceptional quality of Samsung Galaxy Buds2 Pro Wireless Earbuds by Samsung. Designed for Unisex with premium Plastic, Silicone ear tips and Metal charging case, this Audio offers both style and functionality. Perfect for All Season use and available in Graphite, White and Bora Purple, it's a versatile addition to enhance your personal collection.
